GEApiQueryGrowthTasksLookaheadSize.description: Number of items to fetch lookahead when querying the GrowthTasks API.

GELevelingUpKeepGoingNotificationSendAft.description: Send a 'keep going' notification to new editors after this many seconds. Defaults to 48 hours.

GELevelingUpGetStartedNotificationSendAf.description: Send a 'get started' notification to new editors after this many seconds. Defaults to 48 hours.

GELevelingUpManagerTaskTypeCountThreshol.description: The task type count threshold to use when determining whether to prompt a user to try a new task type. If the user has completed more than this number of a particular task type, it will not be suggested as a next task type to try. If a user completes edits for a task type in a multiple of of this number (e.g. 3, 6, or 12 with the default value), then the user is prompted to try a new task type.

GELevelingUpNotificationsTrackingEnabled.description: Feature flag to enable click-through rate tracking for leveling up notifications.

GERefreshUserImpactDataMaintenanceScript.description: Feature flag to determine if the refreshUserImpactData.php maintenance script may run.

GEUserImpactMaxArticlesToProcessForPagev.description: The maximum number of articles to consider when fetching pageview data from the AQS service. Only relevant to the RefreshUserImpactJob. This doubles as a feature flag; set this value to 5 to have it use the same limit used in web requests where we refresh user impact data.

GEUserImpactMaximumProcessTimeSeconds.description: The maximum amount of time, in seconds, that may be used to fetch page view data from AQS. Currently used in job queue context. Default is 5 minutes.

GEHelpPanelNewAccountEnableWithHomepage.description: By default, the help panel is enabled for new accounts. To disable this behavior and use GEHelpPanelNewAccountEnablePercentage instead, set this to false.

GEHelpPanelNewAccountEnablePercentage.description: Percentage of new accounts to enable help panel for. Must be a whole number. Ignored by default, only used if GEHelpPanelNewAccountEnableWithHomepage is false.

GEHelpPanelSearchForeignAPI.description: api.php URL of a foreign wiki to search instead of the current wiki. Used for testing/development to get more/better results.

GEHelpPanelSuggestedEditsPreferredEditor.description: The preferred editor interface for suggested edits. The key is the task type handler ID (template-based or link-recommendation). Valid values for template-based are 'visualeditor' or 'wikitext'; for link-recommendation & image-recommendation only machineSuggestions is valid

WelcomeSurveyEnabled.description: Global ON/OFF switch for the Welcome survey feature.

WelcomeSurveyAllowFreetextResponses.description: If set to true, freetext responses with the welcome survey are allowed.

WelcomeSurveyPrivacyStatementUrl.description: URL of the privacy statement to be used on the Welcome survey.

WelcomeSurveyReminderExpiry.description: Number of days a reminder on Special:Homepage should be shown for if the user has not filled out the welcome survey yet. Set to 0 to disable the reminder.

GEHomepageDefaultVariant.description: Experiment variant to use for users who weren't assigned a variant at account creation time, or the variant they got is not valid anymore. Valid values: 'control'.

GEMentorshipNewAccountEnablePercentage.description: Percentage of new homepage-enabled users who will receive the mentorship module.

GEPersonalizedPraiseBackendEnabled.description: Feature flag controlling whether personalized praise's backend is enabled

GEPersonalizedPraiseNotificationsEnabled.description: Feature flag controlling whether personalized praise notifications are enabled

GEPersonalizedPraiseMaxReverts.description: Maximum number of total reverted edits a mentee can have to be considered praiseworthy or null if check should be skipped.

GEStructuredMentorList.description: Title of the wiki page that has the mentor list in JSON format (used by StructuredMentorProvider)

GEMentorDashboardEnabledModules.description: List of enabled modules in the Mentor dashboard

GEHomepageSuggestedEditsEnabled.description: Global ON/OFF switch for the suggested edits feature on the homepage.

GEHomepageSuggestedEditsEnableTopics.description: Enable topic filters for suggested edits

GENewcomerTasksTaskTypeHandlers.description: Used for registering TaskTypeHandlers to the TaskTypeHandlerRegistry. An associative array with handler ID => handler specification, which is an ObjectFactory specification or a factory callable. Handlers IDs correspond to the 'type' parameters in the task config page.

GENewcomerTasksRemoteApiUrl.description: URL of a remote API (ending with 'api.php') to use for identifying suggested edits. This is meant for developer setups.

GENewcomerTasksRemoteArticleOrigin.description: Origin to append suggested article URLs to (e.g. 'https://en.wikipedia.org'). This is meant for developer setups.

GERestbaseUrl.description: URL of the RESTBase service (PCS Summary API - see https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Page_Content_Service#/page/summary) used for task cards. Autogenerated from the wiki URL when not set.

GEMediaInfoRepos.description: List of repo names which provide WikibaseMediaInfo data.

GEDeveloperSetup.description: Set to true in developer (non-production) settings. In practice this will relax assumptions about page existence, which might be needed to approximate production behavior when e.g. a remote API is used for searching for pages, or a link recommendation service trained on a production wiki is used on a testing wiki.

GENewcomerTasksLinkRecommendationsEnable.description: Global ON/OFF switch for link recommendations.

GELinkRecommendationsFrontendEnabled.description: Global ON/OFF switch for the link recommendations feature. Depending on the state, either the 'links' or the 'link-recommendation' task type is hidden. Can be overridden by SuggestedEdits::LINK_RECOMMENDATIONS_ENABLED_PREF.

GELinkRecommendationsRefreshByIteratingT.description: Whether to refresh link recommendations by iterating through all titles. Temporary config while rolling out this new system, see T386250

GETopicsMatchModeEnabled.description: Global ON/OFF switch for the topics match mode UI feature.

GENewcomerTasksImageRecommendationsEnabl.description: Global ON/OFF switch for image recommendations.

GENewcomerTasksSectionImageRecommendatio.description: Global ON/OFF switch for section-level image recommendations.

GEImageRecommendationServiceUrl.description: Root URL of the image recommendation service (no trailing slash).

GEImageRecommendationServiceHttpProxy.description: HTTP proxy for the service specified via GEImageRecommendationServiceUrl.

GEImageRecommendationServiceUseTitles.description: Use titles instead of page IDs when calling the service. Less ideal but allows setting up test environments to use the production service.

GEImageRecommendationApiHandler.description: Corresponding API handler to use for the (top-level and section-level) image recommendations; can be 'production' (ProductionImageRecommendationApiHandler), 'mvp' (MvpImageRecommendationApiHandler) or 'actionapi' (ActionApiImageRecommendationApiHandler). See these classes for more information.

GEImageRecommendationServiceWikiIdMasque.description: The wiki ID to use in requests to the image recommendation service. Used for developer setups.

GEImageRecommendationServiceAccessToken.description: Personal access token from the wiki GEImageRecommendationServiceUrl points to. For developer setups using the 'actionapi' handler only.

GELinkRecommendationServiceUrl.description: Root URL of the link recommendation service. When using the 'actionapi' handler, this should point to api.php.

GELinkRecommendationServiceAccessToken.description: Personal access token from api.wikimedia.org to use when accessing the external production service. For developer setups only.

GELinkRecommendationServiceTimeout.description: Request timeout when contacting the link recommendation service.

GELinkRecommendationFallbackOnDBMiss.description: Fall back to the service at GELinkRecommendationServiceUrl when the recommendation is not cached in the database. This is only intended for simple local setups.

GELinkRecommendationsUseEventGate.description: Whether to use EventGate for notifying about link recommendation creation. When set to false, uses CirrusSearch diretcly.

GELinkRecommendationServiceWikiIdMasquer.description: The wiki ID to use in requests to the link recommendation service. Used for developer setups.

GELevelingUpManagerInvitationThresholds.description: Article namespace edit count thresholds at which the user should be invited to try suggested edits (assuming they haven't before).

GECampaigns.description:
A map of campaign ID to campaign configuration. Campaign configuration currently includes these fields:
* pattern: a regexp matched against the "campaign" request parameter during signup to determine whether the user should be included in some campaign
* signupPageTemplate: a template name to use for the "benefits" block of Special:CreateAccount
* signupPageTemplateParameters: a map of parameters to pass to the template
* topics: an array of topic IDs (which are defined in GECampaignTopics) to include on the top of the topic selector as custom topics

Examples can be found at https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:GrowthExperiments/Technical_documentation/Special:EditGrowthConfig.

GECampaignTopics.description: Mapping of topic IDs to its search expression, used to show campaign-specific topics in the suggested edits module. Examples can be found at https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:GrowthExperiments/Technical_documentation/Special:EditGrowthConfig.

WelcomeSurveyExperimentalGroups.description: List of experimental groups. A group is defined with a range to randomly match users and the list of questions they will see on the survey.

GELinkRecommendationMinimumTasksPerTopic.description: Minimum number of link recommendation tasks to maintain per ORES topic.

GEUserImpactMaxEdits.description: Maximum number of edits to process for Impact Module statistics

GEUserImpactMaxThanks.description: Maximum number of thanks to process for Impact Module statistics

GEReviseToneSuggestedEditEnabled.description: Enable the Revise Tone feature so newcomers can spot non-neutral wording and receive in-context guidance to help users rewrite a sentence in a more encyclopedic tone.

GEReviseToneExcludedTemplates.description: List of templates used for excluding articles for the ReviseTone task

GEReviseToneExcludedCategories.description: List of categories used for excluding articles for the ReviseTone task

GEReviseToneParagraphScoreThreshold.description: Threshold score above which a Tone issue is considered for the ReviseTone task

GEReviseToneOverrideSearchTerm.description: Overrides generating the search terms for the ReviseTone task. Should only be set to something other than an empty string in beta or dev. Recommended value on beta: 'hastemplate:peacock_inline'. See ReviseToneTaskTypeHandler::getSearchTerm

GEReviseToneServiceUrl.description: Root URL of the internal Revise Tone service (no trailing slash).

GEReviseToneRecommendationProvider.description: Corresponding Recommendation Provider to use for the Revise Tone recommendations; can be 'production' (ApiReviseToneRecommendationProvider), or 'subpage' (SubpageReviseToneRecommendationProvider).

GEUseMetricsPlatformExtension.description: MetricsPlatform/xLab as enrollment authority for experiments
